projects.description: Generate random quote from a list and chaging the background color, react to a button or building timer, project show DOM Manipulation in Javascript
Very usefull function from UX standing point; help to display chunk of data at a time, with as many items as there are, the script allow to show just 10 items a page at a time
For better UI, this functionality validate and help to guide the user through filling the form by giving feedbacks and displaying warnings while the form is being filled.
The game is played by two players, showing the winner after the correct combination is fullfilled, also to keep score
The app grabs number of user between 6 and 48 from an API and also let you make request from API by Nationalities and there is search option as implimented
It's about guess a phrase or a capital, you can also pick a timed game for less than 2 min! also a hint option help to guess process with many featured implimented
A Javascript app, able to target website and grab data and save it to file .csv, using just  NodeJs, capable to do it periodicaly every 7 days.
